alert.note: Alert for Mississippi; Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 2:18PM CDT until July 24 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ALEXANDER...NORTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI AND EAST CENTRAL SCOTT COUNTIES... At 218 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mounds, or near Cairo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cairo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 2. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 14 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
